price: 13. Kaadu usun yot aban dirabboysiyyah alil yok ceytaah, ku-farmoh gudduysiyyah arraba yok yaabc waytaamak meesitak, Jibriil yi-toobokoyta Haaruunû fanah kaa rub farmö gudduysiyyah yoo catamkeh iyye.
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
